name: Messages In The Void
description:
The Void is behind Abigaël and Lily.

The Void destroy the people chased by him.

Will they survive it ?

Being Abigaël, use your phone battery sparingly to light up your way and run faster, or to send messages to Lily.

Please don't run out of power. Continue to run. Continue to communicate.

No other explanations, try to find the best way to get you out of this situation.

Life makes no gifts, nobody explains you how to ask for help when the Void is behind you, and nobody explains you how to help someone chased by the Void.

[/!\ Trigger warning /!\ - Depression]

[In game langage choice between English or French]

[4 endings]

[Made in 72 hours during Ludum Dare 39 (Theme: Running out of power)]
